channel.title: Azure on Zachary Loeber
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Zachary Loeber

item.title: Azure Devops Automated Variable Groups
item.description: In this article I’ll cover how one can automate creating and updating ADO libraries (aka. variable groups) using pipeline as code.

item.title: Ado Keyvault Linked Var Groups
item.description: Azure DevOps keyvault linked variable groups are not easy to automate but it can be done.

item.title: Hugo - A DevOps Approach
item.description: I’ve updated my site to use hugo some time ago. Recently I’ve found some time to add a deployment pipeline for this site as well. This short article will cover how the pipeline code works and dive into multi-stage pipelines.

item.title: Email Reputation and Design: A Condensed Guide
item.description: Very few domains implement the holy grail of email identity reputation frameworks, DMARC. This guide will cover all the steps required to get it implemented for your domain along with some best practices for overall email reputation design.

item.title: PowerShell: AzureAD Dynamic Groups
item.description: A few code snippets for Azure AD dynamic groups. One for creating standard groups for your environment. Another for finding duplicates.

item.title: PowerShell: Office 365 Group Based Licencing Cleanup
item.description: A script to remove directly assigned licenses from user accounts if they overlap with group assigned licenses in Office 365.

item.title: PowerShell: Azure ARM Site Overview
item.description: Visualizing an Azure deployment can be a bit tricky. This short Azure summary script is a good way to start though.
